text: Signature: Description: Computes standardized mean difference 2x2 factorial designs. type argument controls whether independent, main, interaction effects computed. Arguments: | Argument | Type | Required | Default | Description | |——————–|————–|———-|—————-|——————————————————————–| | type | string | Yes | | Effect type: “ind”, “main”, “inter” | | data | data.frame | Yes | | Data frame input data | | col_names | character[2] | | c(“yi”,“vi”) | Names output columns | | append | logical | | TRUE | Append results input data? | | hedges_correction | logical | | TRUE | Apply Hedges’ correction small-sample bias | | Ctrl_mean | numeric | Yes | | Mean control group | | Ctrl_sd | numeric | Yes | | SD control group | | Ctrl_n | integer | Yes | | Sample size control group | | A_mean | numeric | Yes | | Mean group | | A_sd | numeric | Yes | | SD group | | A_n | integer | Yes | | Sample size group | | B_mean | numeric | | NULL | Mean B group (main/inter ) | | B_sd | numeric | | NULL | SD B group | | B_n | integer | | NULL | Sample size B group | | AB_mean | numeric | | NULL | Mean AB group (main/inter ) | | AB_sd | numeric | | NULL | SD AB group | | AB_n | integer | | NULL | Sample size AB group | Returns: data.frame columns effect size variance (default: yi, vi). Wrappers: - SMD_ind(...) — computes independent effect - SMD_main(...) — computes main effect - SMD_inter(...) — computes interaction effect Example:
code: SMD(   type,   data,   col_names = c("yi", "vi"),   append = TRUE,   hedges_correction = TRUE,   Ctrl_mean,   Ctrl_sd,   Ctrl_n,   A_mean,   A_sd,   A_n,   B_mean = NULL,   B_sd = NULL,   B_n = NULL,   AB_mean = NULL,   AB_sd = NULL,   AB_n = NULL ) result <- SMD(   type = "main",   data = my_data,   Ctrl_mean = C_mean, Ctrl_sd = C_sd, Ctrl_n = C_n,   A_mean = A_mean, A_sd = A_sd, A_n = A_n,   B_mean = B_mean, B_sd = B_sd, B_n = B_n,   AB_mean = AB_mean, AB_sd = AB_sd, AB_n = AB_n )

previous_headings: Factorial Design Effect Sizes > SMD - Standardized Mean Difference
title: Effect Size Calculations
text: function computes individual simple effect Factor Control treatment. classic Standardized Mean Difference (SMD), can also computed metafor’s escalc() function using measure = "SMD". individual Standardized Mean Difference Factor calculated : dind=X‾−X‾CtrlSpooled⋅J(m) d_{ind} = \frac{\bar{X}_A - \bar{X}_{Ctrl}}{S_{pooled}} \cdot J(m) : Spooled=(nA−1)sdA2+(nCtrl−1)sdCtrl2nA+nCtrl−2 S_{pooled} = \sqrt{\frac{(n_A-1)sd_A^2 + (n_{Ctrl}-1)sd_{Ctrl}^2}{n_A + n_{Ctrl} - 2}} J(m)J(m) correction small-sample bias introduced Hedges (REF). used default minter, can turned hedges_correction = FALSE. factor computed : J(m)=1−34m−1J(m) = 1 - \frac{3}{4m-1} m=nA+nCtrl−2m = n_A + n_{Ctrl} - 2 sampling variance : var(dind)=1nA+1nCtrl+d22(nA+nCtrl) var(d_{ind}) = \frac{1}{n_A} + \frac{1}{n_{Ctrl}} + \frac{d^2}{2(n_A + n_{Ctrl})}

previous_headings: Factorial Design Effect Sizes > SMD - Standardized Mean Difference
title: Effect Size Calculations
text: compute main effect Factor : dmain=(X‾+X‾AB)−(X‾B+X‾Ctrl)2Spooled⋅J(m)d_{main} = \frac{(\bar{X}_A + \bar{X}_{AB}) - (\bar{X}_{B} + \bar{X}_{Ctrl})}{2S_{pooled}} \cdot J(m) correction small-sample bias JJ shown , degrees freedom now: m=nA+nB+nAB+nCtrl−4m = n_A + n_B + n_{AB} + n_{Ctrl} - 4 case SpooledS_{pooled} pooled standard deviation four groups: Spooled=(nA−1)sdA2+(nB−1)sdB2+(nAB−1)sdAB2+(nCtrl−1)sdCtrl2nA+nB+nAB+nCtrl−4S_{pooled} = \sqrt{\frac{(n_A-1)sd_A^2 + (n_B-1)sd_B^2 + (n_{AB}-1)sd_{AB}^2 + (n_{Ctrl}-1)sd_{Ctrl}^2}{n_A + n_B + n_{AB} + n_{Ctrl} - 4}} sampling variance : var(dmain)=14(1nA+1nB+1nAB+1nCtrl+dA22(nA+nB+nAB+nCtrl)) var(d_{main}) = \frac{1}{4} \left( \frac{1}{n_A} + \frac{1}{n_B} + \frac{1}{n_{AB}} + \frac{1}{n_{Ctrl}} + \frac{d_A^2}{2(n_A + n_B + n_{AB} + n_{Ctrl})} \right)

title: Effect Size Calculations
text: interaction effects: dinter=(X‾AB−X‾B)−(X‾−X‾Ctrl)Spooled⋅J(m)d_{inter} = \frac{(\bar{X}_{AB} - \bar{X}_B) - (\bar{X}_A - \bar{X}_{Ctrl})}{S_{pooled}} \cdot J(m) SpooledS_{pooled} pooled standard deviation four groups, calculated using formula SMD_main(). sampling variance : var(dinter)=1nA+1nB+1nAB+1nCtrl+dInter22(nA+nB+nAB+nCtrl) var(d_{inter}) = \frac{1}{n_A} + \frac{1}{n_B} + \frac{1}{n_{AB}} + \frac{1}{n_{Ctrl}} + \frac{d_{Inter}^2}{2(n_A + n_B + n_{AB} + n_{Ctrl})}

text: main effects: lnRRmain=ln(X‾+X‾ABX‾Ctrl+X‾B) \ln RR_{main} = \ln\left(\frac{\bar{X}_A + \bar{X}_{AB}}{\bar{X}_{Ctrl} + \bar{X}_B}\right) variance vmain=(1X‾+X‾AB)2(sdA2nA+sdAB2nAB)+(1X‾Ctrl+X‾B)2(sdCtrl2nCtrl+sdB2nB) v_{main} = \left(\frac{1}{\bar{X}_A + \bar{X}_{AB}}\right)^2 \left(\frac{sd_A^2}{n_A} + \frac{sd_{AB}^2}{n_{AB}}\right) + \left(\frac{1}{\bar{X}_{Ctrl} + \bar{X}_B}\right)^2 \left(\frac{sd_{Ctrl}^2}{n_{Ctrl}} + \frac{sd_B^2}{n_B}\right)

text: lnCVRind=ln(CVACVCtrl)+12(nA−1)−12(nCtrl−1) lnCVR_{ind} = \ln\left( \frac{CV_{}}{CV_{Ctrl}} \right) + \frac{1}{2(n_{} - 1)} - \frac{1}{2(n_{Ctrl} - 1)} var(lnCVRind=log(CVACVCtrl)+12(nA−1)−12(nCtrl−1) var(lnCVR_{ind} = \log\left( \frac{CV_{}}{CV_{Ctrl}} \right) + \frac{1}{2(n_{} - 1)} - \frac{1}{2(n_{Ctrl} - 1)}

title: Effect Size Calculations
text: lnCVRmain=12ln(CVAB⋅CVACVB⋅CVCtrl)+12(12(nAB−1)+12(nA−1)−12(nB−1)−12(nCtrl−1)) lnCVR_{main} = \frac{1}{2} \ln\left( \frac{CV_{AB} \cdot CV_{}}{CV_{B} \cdot CV_{Ctrl}} \right) + \frac{1}{2} \left(   \frac{1}{2(n_{AB} - 1)} +   \frac{1}{2(n_{} - 1)} -   \frac{1}{2(n_{B} - 1)} -   \frac{1}{2(n_{Ctrl} - 1)} \right) var(lnCVRmain)=var(lnRRmain)+var(lnVRmain) var(lnCVR_{main}) = var(lnRR_{main}) + var(lnVR_{main})

previous_headings: Factorial Design Effect Sizes > lnCVR - Log of Coefficient of Variation Ratio
title: Effect Size Calculations
text: lnCVRinter=log(CVAB/CVBCVA/CVCtrl)+12(12(nAB−1)−12(nA−1)+12(nB−1)−12(nCtrl−1)) lnCVR_{inter} = \log\left( \frac{CV_{AB} / CV_{B}}{CV_{} / CV_{Ctrl}} \right) + \frac{1}{2} \left(   \frac{1}{2(n_{AB} - 1)} -   \frac{1}{2(n_{} - 1)} +   \frac{1}{2(n_{B} - 1)} -   \frac{1}{2(n_{Ctrl} - 1)} \right) var(lnCVRinter)=var(lnRRinter)+var(lnVRinter) var(lnCVR_{inter}) = var(lnRR_{inter}) + var(lnVR_{inter})

title: Effect sizes for Meta-analysis of interactions
text: Calculate standardized mean difference (SMD) interaction fertilization CO2 enrichment:
code: library(minter)   # Create sample data for a 2x2 factorial experiment # Control: No fertilization, ambient CO2 # Fertilization: Added nutrients # CO2: Elevated CO2 # Fert_CO2: Both treatments combined  experiment_data <- data.frame(   Ctrl_mean = 10.2, Ctrl_sd = 2.1, Ctrl_n = 25,  # Control: No treatment   Fert_mean = 15.7, Fert_sd = 3.2, Fert_n = 25,  # Fertilization only   CO2_mean = 12.4, CO2_sd = 2.5, CO2_n = 24,    # Elevated CO2 only   Fert_CO2_mean = 18.9, Fert_CO2_sd = 3.8, Fert_CO2_n = 26  # Both treatments )  # Calculate SMD for interaction result <- SMD_inter(   data = experiment_data,   col_names = c("SMD", "SMDv"),   Ctrl_mean = Ctrl_mean,   Ctrl_sd = Ctrl_sd,   Ctrl_n = Ctrl_n,   A_mean = Fert_mean,   A_sd = Fert_sd,   A_n = Fert_n,   B_mean = CO2_mean,   B_sd = CO2_sd,   B_n = CO2_n,   AB_mean = Fert_CO2_mean,   AB_sd = Fert_CO2_sd,   AB_n = Fert_CO2_n )  # Model library(metafor) res <- rma.mv(SMD, SMDv, ..., data = experiment_data)
